title: Stefanie Ickenroth - First Line Sales Leader - GlaxoSmithKline Pharma GmbH
author: Stefanie Ickenroth
text:
Stefanie Ickenroth
Angestellt, First Line Sales Leader, GlaxoSmithKline Pharma GmbH
Düsseldorf, Deutschland
Werdegang

GSK
